name: League of Light: Dark Omen HD - A Hidden Object Adventure
name_original: League of Light: Dark Omen HD - A Hidden Object Adventure
description:
You've been asked to join the mysterious League of Light, a secret group dedicated to fighting dark forces.

• INVESTIGATE A MONSTROUS BEAST!
It is terrorizing the mountain village of Sorrow's Well and is your first mission as the new member of the League of Light.

• IS THIS BEAST REAL?
Who's behind it? What's really going on in the Dark Lord's castle on the hill?

• EXPLORE A DARK LORD'S CASTLE
No one ever said being in the League would be easy! Face supernatural beasts while you solve this mystery!

• UNLOCK THIS COLLECTOR'S EDITION FOR GREAT BONUSES!
Play the bonus chapter featuring the kingdom of the dwarves and download the wallpapers and concept art for this incredible Hidden Object Puzzle Adventure.

TRY IT FREE, THEN UNLOCK THE FULL ADVENTURE FROM WITHIN THE GAME!
